name: Photo & Video Roulette
description:
Photo & Video roulette is a social and fun board game to play with your friends! The rules are simple:

⋆ Random photos or videos will be picked from your devices
⋆ Photos or videos are shuffled and displayed one by one
⋆ You have to guess whose photo or video is shown
⋆ Fastest player wins
⋆ Share your results on social media, Facebook, Snapchat, Instagram

Play with as many people as you want, choose if you would like to play with random photos, videos, both, or simply select the files yourself.

Have fun!

***

SUBSCRIPTION

- You can subscribe for this app to get full premium access and the ability to play an unlimited number of times
- Subscription option: weekly

- Privacy : http://retropixel.co/privacy
- Terms of Use : http://retropixel.co/terms-of-use
